text: The Denmark men's national field hockey team represents Denmark in men's international field hockey and is controlled by the Danish Hockey Union, the governing body for field hockey in Denmark. Denmark has participated in five Olympic Games and has won one silver medal, in 1920. They have never qualified for the World Cup, but they have participated in two European Championships. ==Competitive record== ===Summer Olympics=== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align: center;" |- !colspan=10|Summer Olympics record |- !Year !Round !Position ! ! ! * ! ! ! !Squad |- | 1908 |colspan=9|Did not participate |-bgcolor=silver | 1920 |Group stage||2nd||3||2||0||1||15||8||Squad |- | 1928 |Group stage||5th||4||2||0||2||5||8||Squad |- | 1932 |colspan=9|Did not participate |- | 1936 |Classification||10th||4||0||1||3||8||21||Squad |- | 1948 |Group stage||11th||4||0||1||3||4||17||Squad |- | 1952 |colspan=9 rowspan=2|Did not participate |- | 1956 |- | 1960 |Group stage||16th||3||0||0||3||3||18||Squad |- | 1964 until 1988 |colspan=9|Did not participate |- | 1992 until 2020 |colspan=9|Did not qualify |- !Total||Best: 2nd||5/24||18||4||2||12||35||72||– |} ===European championships=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !colspan=9|EuroHockey Championship record |- !Year !Round !Position ! ! ! ! ! ! |- | 1970 |17th–19th place pool||18th||6||1||1||4||10||5 |- | 1974 |13th place game||14th||7||2||1||4||3||14 |- | 1978 until 2021 |colspan=8|Did not qualify |- !Total||Best: 14th||2/18||13||3||2||8||13||19 |} {|class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !colspan=11|EuroHockey Championships record |- !Year !Level !Position ! ! ! ! ! ! ! |- | 2005 |IV||1st||5||4||0||1||19||5|| |- | 2007 |III||5th||4||0||0||4||9||16|| |- | 2009 |III||7th||4||0||0||4||12||19|| |- |2011||colspan=9 rowspan=2|Did not enter |- |2013 |- | 2015 |IV||2nd||5||3||1||1||23||9|| |- | 2017 |III||colspan=7|Did not participate|| |- |2019||colspan=9|Did not enter |- | 2021 |IV||colspan=8|Qualified |- !Total||colspan=2|Highest: III||18||7||1||10||63||49||– |} ==References== Category:European men's national field hockey teams Field hockey National team Category:Men's sport in Denmark da:Danmarks hockeylandshold
